title: 权限组问题。
txt_content:
manpromote 123 XXX 将玩家123升级到XXX用户组;
我输入这个指令之后出现
An internal error occurred while attempting to perform this command
求解

replies.author: Mccraft-pepsi
replies.txt_content: 上面显示你没权限使用该命令

庐州月 发表于 2016-7-31 10:52
manuadd 123 xxx
还是一样。出现这个东西。

replies.author: Goblins
replies.txt_content:
关闭服务器，删掉GM的配置文件夹，开服重新生成配置
An internal error occurred while attempting to perform this command
这个提示为无法读取配置文件导致未知错误发生

replies.author: Arobcher
replies.txt_content: Groupmanager 插件配置文件的问题
